titles.title: An original resolution authorizing expenditures by the Committee on Foreign Relations.

action.text: Committee on Foreign Relations. Original measure reported to Senate by Senator Menendez. Without written report.

bill.summary: Authorizes expenditures by the Senate Committee on Foreign Relations for the 113th Congress.
